title: The Gospel Choir
additional-notes: This periodical may have included sheet music or lyrics that might have renewals under Music, rather than under Contributions to Periodicals. We have not systematically surveyed Music copyright renewals.

The latest issue we know of is the January 1923 issue, which is now in the public domain along with its predecessors.  We do not know if there were issues of this periodical published after that, but we did not find any copyright registrations later in the 1920s than 1923. Our 'all content in the public domain' determination is based on the magazine ending in the 1920s.
